# bunkerweb_service (Data Source)

Retrieves an existing BunkerWeb service from the BunkerWeb API.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "bunkerweb" {
  api_endpoint = "https://127.0.0.1:5000/api"
  api_token    = "changeme"
}

data "bunkerweb_service" "example" {
  id = "app.example.com"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Identifier of the service to look up.

### Read-Only

- `is_draft` (Boolean) Whether the service is still a draft.
- `server_name` (String) Server name of the service.
- `variables` (Map of String) Service variables as key/value pairs.
